title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: The ControlExampleText component emits a beep sound when selecting the SWT.MULTI style option. However, this behavior seems incorrect.
OB: When selecting the SWT.MULTI style option in the ControlExampleText component, a beep sound is emitted.
EB: No sound or any unexpected behavior should occur when selecting the SWT.MULTI style option in the ControlExampleText component.
SR:
1. Launch the application with Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K.
2. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
3. Go to the Text tab.
4. Click on the Styles SWT.SINGLE and then click on Styles SWT.MULTI again.
